m_szDocTitle: Patent US20150111127 - Fuel cell with enhanced mass transfer characteristics - Google Patents
m_szDocSumamry: Fuel cell with enhanced mass transfer characteristics US 20150111127 A1 Abstract Disclosed is a fuel cell with enhanced mass transfer characteristics in which a highly hydrophobic porous medium, which is prepared by forming a micro-nano dual structure in which nanometer-scale protrusions with a high aspect ratio are formed on the surface of a porous medium with a micrometer-scale roughness by plasma etching and then by depositing a hydrophobic thin film thereon, is used as a gas diffusion layer, thereby increasing hydrophobicity due to the micro-nano dual structure and the hydrophobic thin fil
